synopsis.text: Special Jury Prize winner at the Fukui Film Festival and Grand Prize winner at the AES Japan Conference Sound Awards, this anime follows a determined protagonist who, despite not always knowing his destination, must forge ahead in pursuit of his goal. As he embarks on this journey, he undergoes constant transformation, allowing his heart and mind to drift and race towards the goal he uncovers. Directed by Yukie Nakauchi and produced by Mitsuko Okamoto, this anime boasts a captivating soundtrack by Chikara Uemizutaru and award-winning sound design by Misaki Hasuo and Kayoko Tsuji. Graduate Work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
